ygData.subject: Re: Oh, How I hate those 1 point bashes
ygData.msgSnippet: hehehehe yeah it does suck doesn t it? and i had a trip to fear last night.....since the patch, that place is a deathtrap waiting to happen.....out of at least
ygData.messageBody:
hehehehe yeah it does suck doesn't it? and i had a trip to fear last
night.....since the patch, that place is a deathtrap waiting to
happen.....out of at least 30 ppl starting out, 25 at least died in the 1st
minute.....the aggro range on the crits now is HUGE.....we had to have a gm
come in and help us get our corpses.....what kinda crap is that? they
could've put the level limit on it, and then kept the monsters the
same....it was hard enough before....but anywoo, done with my rantings for
today (;

(\/)ystix Spellchaser
lv 50 human cleric of The Rathe

Kevin Dailey wrote:

> From: Kevin Dailey <kevin_dailey@...>
>
> Yeah, but I'm still astonished that with Invulnerability on, I can fall
> from a height that would flatten me for more than 1000 damage, can laugh
> at damage spells that would kill me in an instant, but can be stunned by
> a freaking low-level skeleton who bashes me for 1 measly point of
> damage. C'mon Verant, WTF?
